reviews.review: Good co-op game!!!
Шикарная мультиплеерная игра.  Рекомендую всем.

장점 : 좀비 디펜스 게임의 최고봉, 다양한 퍽(직업)과 역할의 세분화가 잘 되어있음, 한국 서버가 활성화됨.
단점 : 비매너 유저가 좀 많음, 처음에 적응 못하면 라딸용 게임이 될 가능성이 높음, 괜시리 비싸면서 효용성 별로 없는 DLC들, 고난이도로 갈수록 초보유저는 하기가 힘듬.
fun

Killing waves after waves of mutated creatures in awesome English themed maps is fun. Doing that with Steampunk guns and Scottish Claymores makes it better. The multiplayer makes it great. I love this game.

Characters/Setting

The story and setting for this game are about as basic as you can get for a zombie game. Lab experiment goes wrong and zombies (or Zed's in this case) overrun London and the surrounding countryside. Now what remains of the police and military must band together alongside the few survivors to try and fight off the hungry horde. 

What little more that is given in the way of story is told in boxes of text before each map. However at large the plot isn't groundbreaking, but that isn't particularly problematic for this sort of game.


Gameplay/Interface

The basic gameplay of Killing Floor is an online co-op Horde Mode, surviving waves of foes with chances to resupply between each wave. However it adds some of its own touches to the formula. Most notably is the additional of classes, or Perks as they are called here. Each of these Perks serves a different purposes and utilizes different weapons and perks, ranging from the melee focused Berserker who can wield a claymore to the Medic who can fire healing darts from their gun.

It also adds a leveling system for each trait that fills up as you complete certain task. As this level increases, certain stats improve and, in some cases, you even begin spawning with better equipment. This can range from beginning the match with one of your Perk’s weapons instead of the basic pistol to starting with the every essential protective body armor. 

As for the Zeds, Killing Floor faces the players off with a variety of increasingly difficult foes throughout the 4-10 waves. Early waves generally start off comprised of the basic grabbing Clots and bile spewing Bloats, but build up to the fire spewing Husk, wailing Sirens and the ever dangerous Fleshpound.
Matches then finish off in a battle against the powerful Patriarch, who wields a deadly arsenal of weaponry along with the abilities to cloak himself and regenerate. These foes will prove further challenging as players move up the Difficulty levels, from Beginner to Hell on Earth.  

Finally the game provides the player with a wide variety of maps to fight their way through, including 5 core maps and an additional 17 added for free over a course of about a 5 year span. The games accompanying Steam Workshop further increases this number by boasting a wide range of fanmade content and maps, some of which were released officially as part of the additional 17.   

The only downside the game does have is its interface. Being originally created by a small team as a mod for Unreal Tournament 2004 means that its UI is functional but isn’t as spot on as it could be. It is all very basic and the placement of some important information, such as ammo reserve and player health are rather oddly placed. The control for the game can also take some getting use to, such as how to heal yourself or seal doors, and the game does not support controllers in any capacity. 

 
Animation/Sound

For a game made by a 10 person team in 3 months, KF was decent animation and sound. Zeds have tells that allow the allow player to anticipated their action once learned. They are all have unique cries, allowing plays to know what's around even if they cannot be seen. Players also have a range of lines, all of which are delightfully British, some of which have even become beloved memes among fans. The whole visual/audio experience is rounded off with a soundtrack comprised of intense metal, fitting the gritty B-Movie feel of the whole game.  


Final Thoughts

Killing Floor is easy to enjoy both with friends or complete strangers online. The game has a thriving community, even after 7 years and the love they have for the game is very apparent. So if you're thirsting for a little zombie killing action in the vein of Left 4 Dead, I recommend giving it a try. So grab some mates, strap on some body armor, grab your incendiary shotgun and go make some sweet sweet dosh slaying Zeds!


Cheers!
~Fish

This is a great casual shoot-'em-up zombie game. The normal mode has enough difficulty for one person, vamp it up to "Hell on Earth" to give the game an impossiblity to it. Great for if you only want to sit down for 10 minutes to play a single round or for playing all day.

Killing Floor является довольно качественным примером превращения мода в полноценную игру. Если к тому, что написано прибавить саундтрек в стиле рок — и вот он, почти идеальный командный шутер с мутантами в качестве пушечного мясца. Хотя лучше в данный продукт играть с компанией — эдак человек 5-6, обмениваясь оружием и деньгами, чувствовать в этой мясорубке плечо товарища. Игра придётся по вкусу всем, но больше всего тем, для кого Counter-Strike — слишком тяжело, а Left 4 Dead — слишком легко. А для тех, кому и этого безумия мало — есть различные «пакеты», с которыми ваша мясорубка станет более праздничной.
So much fun with friends to coordinate objectives and survivale. Community content is endless fun. Nice change of pace from all the competitive games out there today.
too much zombies!!!!
DOSH!!!
Fantastic game, so fast-paced and white-knuckled and nerve-racking.
Ageless fun, continually a pleasure to get a group together and clear some rounds.

Ah killing floor, a classic wave shooter that doesn't fail to impress me. 

On the surface, the game doesn't look too special. A typical horrorish shooter.  But once you start playing, it comes together to be an awesome expierence.  Co-op works really well for this game, meaning you actually do have to work together to destory the horrid creatures. Rather than pull the one man army crap.  

WARNING!: The gameplay does not do anything groundbreaking here and can be a bit redundant after a while. 

One thing that is good about this game is the community. Unlike games like L4D that have mainly an arrogant douchebag community, Killing floor has a much more friendly one. Meaning  you don't have to hear some retard have a bitch fit over the slightest mistake. 

I recommend this game to those looking for a simple shooter thats easy to pick up.
It's pretty swell.
krutyak

A great game from tripwire interactive!
Killing Floor is basically a Cooperative wave game with different difficulty levels where you survive against zombies(nicknamed speciemen,or ZEDs)with a wide variety of weapons and 7 different classes with their own bonuses you must level by completing certain objectives.it has been updated many times and still is being updated,you can purchase the many DLC's for new characters or bonus weapons or golden guns if you want,but that is not something that is required to fully enjoy the game.

10/10 a must have.

Killing Floor ist ein wirklich gelungener FP-Shooter mit vielen verschiedenen Maps.
Im Alleingang ist mir das Spiel etwas zu langweilig und die Jagd nach Errungenschaften verläuft sich irgendwann in stures Abarbeiten.
Richtig lustig macht es aber erst im Team auf einer LAN-Party oder im Internet. Wobei ich hier die LAN-Party bevorzuge, da ich meine Mitstreiter persönlich kenne. Im Internet wird es erst dann richtig stimmig, wenn man das richtige Team zusammen hat.

Jeder, der einen FP-Shooter für eine LAN-Party und seinen Clan sucht, kann ich Killing Floor nur empfehlen.
Die Updates z. B. zu Weihnachten etc. machen das Gameplay nicht langweilig und durch die Updates zeigen sich auch Gegner in immer neuen Gewändern.
Классная игра
Perkeleen hyvää zombie-räiskintää, vaikka onkin jo 4-5 vuotta vanha.
Great game to sink hours into with a friend. The community is still around, and I've never had a problem finding a server.

一款09年虚幻3引擎打造的恐怖合作向FPS游戏，画面看上去或许有些“不给力”，但是我跟你讲打击感真的很不错（该有的断肢啦什么的都有）…… 你要做的就是和你的小伙伴们一起拿着心爱的9mm小手枪一起打赃比（飞机），新手玩家基本开局只有一把9mm，当然每个职业有不同的加成，了解游戏后就可以去一些HARD难度服务器玩了，再高级一点就是HELL啦！怎么了，你还在犹豫什么，赶快买了让L大神带你玩转KF啊！（PS 我可是无敌奶妈 保你不死！）

This game is actually really good, once you get use to the mechanics that is. What mad the game difficult at first for me was trying to find an online game, as well as realizing there are diffculty modes that would really shy a person away from this game. On normal you easily start to get hooked, but if you accidently join a hard game it will not make you want to play again.  I love the first person aspect in this game. It looks really realistic aiming down the sights. I just hate how all the ACOG scoped weapons literally give you no zoom except for one gun in the entire game that is expensive. I love how they keep pumping guns out in DLC. Graphics wise it looks great, some computers that usually cannot handle gaming can play this game if they lower their video settings which is awesome.
Одно из лучших творейний геймотографа) Маст хев! Форевер!
GOOD

Human Power!  Killing Floor brings a whole new level of awesome to zombie slaying.  Think shotguns are the best?   Want to be a team player and heal your comrades?  Perhaps you prefer to chop heads left and right?  Or do you simply love to make it rain dosh everywhere you go?  Killing floor has it all, with endless waves of horrifying foes, a wide variety of maps, weapons, and classes, and a healthy competition between your teammates that will have you striving to not only survive, but shine on the scoreboard.  Tripwire even provides periodic updates and holiday events with special achievements and Zed models to keep things fresh.  Cooperate to survive, or style on your teammates by taking on the horde solo.  The Zombie Apocalypse is now!

Awesome!

Five dollar game, not much more for the game with all DLC. For this paltry sum, you get a decent co-op game of mostly-mindless fun, with tons of ongoing support from the devs. Seasonal updates with new maps and themes, for free. New weapons added, again for free. Labor of love, born from a mod, actively supported and expanded for free by the devs. I like it so much, I buy even the extavagant goldne weapon skins to show my support.

Only downsides are dated graphics (which might be a bonus to some, since it will run on old machines without issue - until recently I ran it on a five year old laptop with medium/high settings), and the occasional bad egg on pubs (but how is that different from any other online game?). Minor quibbles, and even the second one doesn't have anything to do with the game itself.
Strangely addicting

This game is SUPER badass, and sometimes even horrific. Killing Floor gets extremely intense at points. The mutants are insane, I have no idea how people would come up with the idea for them. If you are debating whether or not you should buy it or not, go ahead and buy it. You will be completely satisfied.

Хотите сыграть в экшен на выживание, пострелять в зомби? Обратите внимание на серию L4D.
Хотите убить свои нервы - играйте в это.
Здесь нет никакой тактики, сплошной абузинг, система левелинга - просто поощрение задротства.
Дурацкая и однообразная озвучка персонажей (которую НЕЛЬЗЯ выключить... только если выключить звук полностью), глупые игровые решения (например, нельзя отменить перезарядку, но которая включается почти всегда с пустой обоймой), баги, результат игры определяет не скилл, а донат и задротство.

Дешевый шутер во многих смыслах.

Killing Floor кооперативный хоррор-шутер на выживание с видом от первого лица, действие которого разворачивается на улицах заброшенных городов и предместьях Британии незадолго после неудачного эксперимента по созданию и клонированию «суперсолдат». Вы и ваши товарищи — члены войск вооруженных сил, сброшенных в эти места с простой задачей — выжить как можно дольше, зачистив зону высадки от последствий неудачного эксперимента! Очень интересная зомби мочилово где вы выживаете с друзьями! В конце вас ждет босс! Сможете ли вы в одиночку или с друзьями одолеть его ? Всё в ваших руках!!
Muy buen juego en mi opinión, antiguo, pero si te gustan los Survival Horror, con armas, y sobre todo, jugar con los amigos, es una buena elección.

You know. This game was cool. Really cool. I bought this game when it came out.  Its about sombies that break out of there cages and start hurting people. Military experiments went wrong and people started to make you pay euros for weapons when you are trying to stop the infection. Those fucking idiots.

        This game is alright when you play by yourself but when you get together with friends, it gets 10x more fun and interesting to play. The game doesn't really have any in depth story but its fucking hilarious.  

       When you get to play at least 45 hours of the game it really starts to die down once you've played and beat every map.
Then you gift your friend the game when you're already bored of the game, you play it with him for about 10 hours total, then you uninstall the fucking game cuz its boring as fuck, then he bugs you to play the game with him/her. When you actually see how FUCKING STUPID THIS GAME you realize that this game is only fun for a fraction of the day and that you will never play again. It's a dust collector on the shelf of your steam library. 10/10

twas fun to play. that and very fustrating :D

I have played this game far too much for my own good, but it is absolutely fantastic.  The classes add nice diversity and there are plenty of weapons for each.  Should you want more you can always buy the dlc, but they are by no means required.

The game prioritizes teamwork (especially on higher difficulties) and has a great community.  Many people helped me with learning the ins and outs of the game when I was new and there are plenty of resources for each class.

Would seriously recommend this game (especially if you can grab it on sale).  I've gotten hundreds of hours out of it so it was well worth the price.

This game may seen like another zombie shoot em' up but its WAY more, with seasonal events like Twisted Christmas and Summer Side Show it adds a flair other games like this can only dream of. This game also has developers that love the community with special DLC. Over al my veiw over Killing Floor is 10/10, but be careful its addictive.

Killing Floor is not just another zombie survival game. While it does hold on to the aspects of a post-apocalyptic, that make the genre likeable, it also puts an interesting twist on it. You and team of 5 others are pitted against a set amount of rounds, each getting more difficult. Teamwork is required to survive and make it to the end. All of this put together makes for a great game. Buy it for a fun, co-op expierence.
